personal.name: Harsh Padhya
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I specialize in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture, with a strong focus on performance optimization and developer experience. When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open source projects, writing technical articles, or exploring the latest in web technologies.

hero.tagline: Building the web, one component at a time
hero.description: I craft exceptional digital experiences with clean code, thoughtful design, and a relentless focus on performance. Let's build something amazing together.
